mdx.rawBody:
---
Song: mundhinam
Film: VAraNam Ayiram
---
Notes: s r2 g3 m1 p d2 n3 S

mundhinam pArTHEnE pArTHadhum thOtrEnE  salladai kaNNAga nenjamum puNNAnathE
n  p  n   nS S  S  n  p  n    nS S  S   p  p S   n2 n2n2 d  p m   p  d p p

eTHanai nALAga unnai nAn pArAmal engu thAn pOnEnO nAtkaLum veeNAnathE
n p n   nSS S  n p   n   nSS S   p p  S    n2n2n2 d  p m   mp d d p

vAnaTHil nee veNNilA 
p d S    R   RM G R

yEkkaTHil nAn thEivadhA
p  d S    R   RM  G R

ippOdhu ennOdu vandhAl enna oor pArkka ondrAha sendrAl enna (2)
P P R   P P R  RM G2   R S  P   P   R  P  P R  RM  G2  R S

(mundhinam)

Stanza 1:

thulA thottil unnai vaiTHu nigar seiya ponnai vaiTHAl thulAbAram thOrkAthO pErazhagE
S  M  G   R   S R   n  S   S M   G  R  S  R   n  S    S  P P P   P   P PD  PDM G  R

mugam pArTHu pEsum unnai mudhal kAdhal sindhum kaNNai aNaikkAmal pOvEnO AruyirE
S M   G  R   S R   n S   S M    G R    S  R    n  S   SP   P P   P P PD PDMG R

Oh oru nizhal pOla vidAmal unnai thodarvEnadi
G  G   G G    M G  R G R   S d   d  S  M G M

pugazh pOla padAmal pattu nagarvEnadi
G G    M G  R G R   S  d  d S  M G M

vinA nooru kanAvum nooru vidai solladi
G2G2 G2 R  S R S   n  p  p p   pR R R

(mundhinam)

Stanza 2: (notes similar to Stanza 1)

kadal neelam mangum nerum Alai vandu theendum thorum
Manam sendru moolgAtho eerathile
thalai sAike thoalum thantAi viral kottum pakkum vandai
Idal mattum ennum yen dhooratile
Pagal neram kanakal kanden urangamale
Uyirendu muraya kanden nerungamale
Unai endri eneke edhu edhirkAlame

(mundhinam)
